name: garden/en
text:
Close your eyes and take a deep breath in. <PAUSE: 4> Exhale slowly, releasing all the tension from your body. <PAUSE: 5> Picture yourself standing at the entrance of a beautiful, tranquil garden. With each step you take, feel the soft earth beneath your feet. <PAUSE: 6>

As you walk further in, notice the vibrant colors of the flowers around you. See how each bloom is unique, radiating its own beauty. <PAUSE: 5> Take a moment to bend down and gently touch one of the petals, feeling its soft, delicate texture. <PAUSE: 7> Notice the different shapes and sizes, and the way they sway ever so slightly with the breeze. <PAUSE: 6>

The air is filled with the scent of fresh blooms, a blend of roses, lilacs, and jasmine. Breathe in deeply and let the fragrance fill your lungs, bringing you a sense of calm and peace. <PAUSE: 8> Walking further, you hear the gentle sound of a stream nearby. The water flows softly, creating a soothing melody in the background. <PAUSE: 6>

Follow the sound until you reach the stream. Stand by its edge and watch as the clear water glides over smooth stones. <PAUSE: 6> You continue to walk along the stream until you find a peaceful spot to sit. <PAUSE: 7> Lower yourself gently onto the grass and feel the earth's cool embrace supporting you. <PAUSE: 6>

Close your eyes again and take another deep breath in. <PAUSE: 4> As you exhale, imagine all your worries and stresses flowing out of you and being carried away by the gentle stream. <PAUSE: 8> Absorb the serenity around you. The flowers, the fresh scent, the calming sound of the stream, they all come together to create a sanctuary of peace. <PAUSE: 9>

Feel the warmth of the sun on your skin, bringing a sense of comfort and lightness. <PAUSE: 7> Allow yourself to be fully present in this moment, embracing the tranquility that surrounds you. <PAUSE: 9> Take a few more deep breaths, and with every exhale, feel more and more at peace. <PAUSE: 10>

When you’re ready, slowly bring your awareness back to the present moment. Take your time to gently wiggle your fingers and toes. <PAUSE: 6> When you feel ready, open your eyes slowly, carrying the peace of this tranquil garden with you. <PAUSE: 10>
parts: Close your eyes and take a deep breath in.
Exhale slowly, releasing all the tension from your body.
Picture yourself standing at the entrance of a beautiful, tranquil garden. With each step you take, feel the soft earth beneath your feet.
As you walk further in, notice the vibrant colors of the flowers around you. See how each bloom is unique, radiating its own beauty.
Take a moment to bend down and gently touch one of the petals, feeling its soft, delicate texture.
Notice the different shapes and sizes, and the way they sway ever so slightly with the breeze.
The air is filled with the scent of fresh blooms, a blend of roses, lilacs, and jasmine. Breathe in deeply and let the fragrance fill your lungs, bringing you a sense of calm and peace.
Walking further, you hear the gentle sound of a stream nearby. The water flows softly, creating a soothing melody in the background.
Follow the sound until you reach the stream. Stand by its edge and watch as the clear water glides over smooth stones.
You continue to walk along the stream until you find a peaceful spot to sit.
Lower yourself gently onto the grass and feel the earth's cool embrace supporting you.
Close your eyes again and take another deep breath in.
As you exhale, imagine all your worries and stresses flowing out of you and being carried away by the gentle stream.
Absorb the serenity around you. The flowers, the fresh scent, the calming sound of the stream, they all come together to create a sanctuary of peace.
Feel the warmth of the sun on your skin, bringing a sense of comfort and lightness.
Allow yourself to be fully present in this moment, embracing the tranquility that surrounds you.
Take a few more deep breaths, and with every exhale, feel more and more at peace.
When you’re ready, slowly bring your awareness back to the present moment. Take your time to gently wiggle your fingers and toes.
When you feel ready, open your eyes slowly, carrying the peace of this tranquil garden with you.
